query: SELECT contractNumber, rentalStartDate, rentalEndDate, dailyRate, lateFee, lateFeePercentage, status, DATEDIFF(NOW(), rentalEndDate) as calculated_days_overdue FROM rentalContracts WHERE status = 'overdue' AND dailyRate = '40.00' LIMIT 1;
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway03.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 3JZ9fT9capQqaJ5.root --database 7Q8gdiHiBpSXUrkFz6JMfV --execute SELECT contractNumber, rentalStartDate, rentalEndDate, dailyRate, lateFee, lateFeePercentage, status, DATEDIFF(NOW(), rentalEndDate) as calculated_days_overdue FROM rentalContracts WHERE status = 'overdue' AND dailyRate = '40.00' LIMIT 1;
